Install HEIF Image Extensions alongside it

faq.question: Is the HEVC extension from Device Manufacturer really free?
faq.answer: Yes, the extension titled 'HEVC Video Extensions from Device Manufacturer' is free, unlike the standard HEVC extension which costs $0.99.

faq.question: Why do my converted JPEGs appear sideways?
faq.answer: This happens when the converter fails to read the EXIF Orientation Tag. Use tools like iMazing or libheif that properly preserve metadata.

faq.question: Does converting HEIC to JPG lose quality?
faq.answer: Some quality loss is inevitable since HEIC supports 10-bit color while JPEG is 8-bit. Set quality to 92-95% to minimize visible degradation.

faq.question: How can I stop taking HEIC photos on iPhone?
faq.answer: Go to Settings → Camera → Formats and select 'Most Compatible' to capture JPEGs natively instead of HEIC.
